name: TidyCal
description: Schedule some time to chat. Anything you want.

name: Telegram
description: Telegram is my preferred messaging platform.

name: Proton Mail
description: Proton Mail is an easy way to send encrypted email. No crypto knowledge necessary.

name: Public Key
description: If your message needs a little more security, download my public key.

name: Keybase
description: Keybase is a handy way to handy way to store public PGP keys and try to solve the key validation problem. It includes a chat as well.

name: X
description: Love it or hate it, its the best place to get and share information.

name: LinkedIn
description: You can see my professional journey, accomplishments, and contacts.

name: Facebook
description: Mostly used for keeping in touch with family and friends.

name: Instagram
description: Any picture I deem worthy of sharing is there. Not many, but the important ones.

name: Reddit
description: I love Reddit. Its my favorite place to find new memes and interesting videos.

name: GitHub
description: Check out my open-source projects and contributions.
